creditline: Gift of Kenneth and Sally Leafman Appelbaum
description: handle with ball and lobed designs; protruding element with applied goat, drunken man in coat and hat with wine cup and smiling child
markings: to R of boy, stamped: [N - 3 (Cyrilic)/ 1866 (?)/ 84/ (illegible city mark)]; at bottom and top points of protruding elements, stamped: illegible marks
title: Grogger (noise maker)
